summary: CallCraftAI app deployment/publishing on Caffeine; user is trying to get the free domain URL to load the live app instead of the placeholder/draft.
known_issues: Free domain (callcraftai.caffeine.xyz) shows the default Caffeine placeholder / routes to a draft URL when only a draft deploy exists or the draft has expired (domain not linked to an active published build).

new_feature_requests.summary: Publish the app to the free Caffeine domain (callcraftai.caffeine.xyz) so it loads the live site instead of the placeholder/draft URL.
